def my_first_kata(a,b):
    # isinstance(a, int) and isinstance(b, int)
    # does not work.
    # The real question here is why.
    # and the real answer is, bools are 0 and 1 at the end of the day.

    if type(a) == int and type(b) == int:
        return a%b + b%a
    return False
